EmailTemplate.name: Calls Logged as CR BSI
EmailTemplate.subject: Calls Logged as CR BSI
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your recent inquiry.
Copyrighting your creative work protects it from unauthorized use. With a registered Copyright, you control how your work is reproduced, distributed and presented publicly. LegalZoom will forward your materials to the Library of Congress to complete the Copyright registration.
LegalZoom's preparation cost is $114 dollars. All Copyright applications require an additional $35 dollar government filing fee.
Additional information is available online at LegalZoom's Copyright Frequently Asked Questions: http://www.legalzoom.com/copyrights-guide/copyrights-definition.html.
To view or file Copyright application, please click on the link below:
http://www.legalzoom.com/legal-copyrights/copyrights-pricing.html
All Copyright applications have a 7-10 business day processing time frame, after we receive a copy or copies of your work.
Online payments can be made by Visa, Mastercard, American Express or Discover.
Once you submit your application, please print your order confirmation page in order to view the next steps to complete your order.
Please feel free to contact our {!snippetVariable.ipbsi_dept_full} if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ip_phone}. Our {!snippetVariable.ipbsi_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.ip_hours}.
Thank you again for choosing LegalZoom.
Best regards,
LegalZoom {!snippetVariable.ipbsi_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ip_phone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
